DOC.brief_summary: We investigate efficacy safety pharmacokinetic model-based patient-controlled analgesia ( PCA ) regimens fentanyl postoperative analgesia total intravenous anesthesia ( TIVA ) .
DOC.brief_title: Fentanyl Background Infusion Acute Postoperative Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Infusions fentanyl ( 2 ml/hr diluent equivalent 0.5 Î¼g/kg/hr fentanyl ) maintain fixed-rate 2 ml/hr postoperative 24 hr , decremental rate 6.0 ml/hr 8.0 ml/hr 1 hr , 4.0 ml/hr 1~3 hr 2.0 ml/hr 3~24 hr , postoperatively .
DOC.criteria: patient undergo patientcontrolled analgesia ( PCA ) hysterectomy neurologic disorder psychiatric disorder renal hepatic disorder
